# Sign Up

Signing up with QuickerNotes is easy. Navigate to the sign up page and you'll be up and running in 2 minutes.

Once you add your information and a valid credit card you will receive an email with instructions on how to enable the QuickerNotes application with your MINDBODY site. If you don't receive the email please email support.
